resources.string:
"Material is the metaphor.

"
"
A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion." "The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet no. " "technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.

"
"Surfaces and edges of the material provide visual cues that are grounded in reality. there " "use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the is a" "flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physical.

 "
"world, without breaking the rules of physics.
" "The fundamentals of light, surface, and movement are key to conveying how objects move, " "interact, and exist in space and in relation to each other. Realistic lighting shows is " "seams, divides space, and indicates moving parts.

"
